idea:
Backed by strategic investment from Onida, TranZact is a 3 year old company based out of Mumbai. We are a team of IIT/IIM graduates and are currently catering to 70 customers within Maharashtra

TranZact is a tax compliant cloud based Business software which automates and manages your Inventory, Production, Sales, Purchase, and Quotations. It has integration APIs with accounting software to remove double entry and ensure error free accounting

TranZact is an economical solution designed specifically for SME Manufacturers and Traders

Why chose TranZact over a traditional ERP?

- Zero Upfront Cost

- 2-weeks Go-Live

- Monthly Subscription

- Lifetime Free Support

- Unlimited Upgrades

name: FCB TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
